tool_description: Identifies potential conflicts, interactions, and incompatibilities between skincare products when used together in a routine.

product_list.description: List of products to check for conflicts

active_ingredients.description: Key active ingredients in each product (same order as product_list)

usage_timing.description: When each product is used: morning, evening, or both

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: product_list, active_ingredients, and usage_timing must have same length
Invalid usage timing: Each entry must be morning, evening, or both
Insufficient products: Need at least 2 products to check for conflicts
Too many products: Maximum 15 products can be analyzed for conflicts
Missing ingredient data: Each product must have active ingredient information
usage: Provide list of products with their active ingredients and usage timing. Tool identifies potential conflicts and suggests timing adjustments.

conflict_pairs.description: Pairs of products with potential conflicts

severity_levels.description: Severity of each conflict: mild, moderate, severe
